summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4093 for the construction of a trunk sewer and subsewers along Michigan Street, from Duwamish Waterway to Corson Avenue; and along certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; and the construction of branch of lateral sewers along certain streets and avenues; under Ordinance No. 49152, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
